title: Cosmos.Ep8.Travels In Space and Time.divx
description:
Episode 8: Travels In Space and Time

A startling voyage to see how star patterns change over millions of
years is followed by a journey to the planets of other stars and a look
at the possibility of time travel. Dr. Sagan takes us to Italy, where
the youthful Albert Einstein first wondered what it would be like to
ride on a beam of light.

Digitally Remastered
Audio: 6 Channel Stereo (English)
Video: 4:3  640x480 (Divx)
